TopicTitle: Spoetnic like command module reverses ailerons movement in latest build (1.0.3)

Articles.Content:
Hi All,

Found out today, after a few hours of struggling, that the Spoetnic like command module when used in the SPH results in inverted pitch aileron movement. Setting inverted on the aileron right click menu doesn't solve this.

You can off course rotate the command module 180 degrees round its axis to get 'normal' behavior, but sadly then the navball shows the world upside down. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Greets,

Jan
